title: Mac User trying to use the new Lol
body: So im able to click on the old lol and its pops up and says the time to update is here at the top. and install leauge of legends in the middle so i click on it and download the new Lol. i put it in my applications and on the desktop. though anytime i go to launch the new Lol it quits unexpectedly withought ever popping up, never letting me fully download the game. any know what i should do thanks. older macbook tuned up and updated.

replies.body: Heya, this is likely happening due to a connection block that can't reach the patching service.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help fix this up!
